channel.title: How do you ip ban?
channel.description: hi i put ::banip in to day and ::ipban username and even that didnt work then 1 of the players ips for a test i put the number bi in to thr baned ip then restarted server and did not work please help

item.title: How do you ip ban?
item.dc:creator: @slump40 slump40
item.description:
@slump40 wrote:

If those do not work go into the character folder and find there user name and then get the ip from them and go to the data folder and go into the bannedips text pad and put there ip in there.
